caption.p: HIV-1 pol PR-RT phylogenetic tree. HIV-1 pol PR-RT sequences (∼1.300 nt) circulating in Krasnoyarsk ( n = 133), Tomsk ( n = 98), and representative sequences from Novosibirsk. Designations of strains are colored according to the geographic origin of each sequence: red denotes HIV-1 isolated in Krasnoyarsk Krai; blue in Tomsk Oblast; and black HIV-1 reference sequences. HIV-1 isolated from Krasnoyarsk Krai PWID are marked with an asterisk.
